data.title: HEDIS Measures and Technical Resources
data.meta_description: 191 million people are enrolled in plans that report HEDIS results. That makes HEDIS one of health care’s most widely used performance improvement tools.
data.text:
Vol. 1: Narrative

Overview of the HEDIS measurement set and how the data are used.

Order this publication

HEDIS MY 2025 Summary of Changes (Posted August 1, 2024)

HEDIS MY 2025 Measure Descriptions (Posted August 1, 2024)

Vol. 2: Technical Specifications for Health Plans

HEDIS nonsurvey measures for organizations; instructions on data collection for each measure; general guidelines for calculations and sampling.

Order this publication

HEDIS MY 2025: What’s New, What’s Changed, What’s Retired

Technical Specifications Update (anticipated release date: March 31, 2025)

HEDIS MY 2025 Audit Timeline (anticipated release date: March 31, 2025)

Note: The Risk Adjustment Tables are available for free order in the NCQA Store. Once ordered, the Risk Adjustment Tables will be available in the “My Downloads” tab on My NCQA.”

Note: The Medication List Directory is available for free order in the NCQA Store. Once ordered, the Medication List Directory will be available in the “My Downloads” tab on My NCQA.”

HEDIS FAQs

HEDIS Measures Included in the Quality Rating System (QRS)

Quality Rating System Measure Technical Specifications are unique to the issuers offering plans on the Exchange and participating in the CMS Quality Rating System (QRS).

MY 2025 HEDIS for the Quality Rating System Value Set Directory (anticipated release date: March 31, 2025)

Vol. 3: Specifications for Survey Measures

HEDIS survey measures and standardized surveys from the Consumer Assessment of Healthcare Providers and Systems (CAHPS®) program.

Order this publication (Anticipated Release Date: September 2024)

CAHPS 5.1H Survey

Survey Vendor Certification Program

MY 2024 Validated Member-Level File Layout (Anticipated Release Date: January 2026)

Vol. 5: HEDIS Compliance Audit™: Standards, Policies and Procedures

The approved method for auditing the HEDIS production process, including an information systems capabilities assessment, an evaluation of compliance with HEDIS specifications and standards that Certified HEDIS Compliance Auditors must use when conducting a HEDIS audit.

Order this publication (Anticipated Release Date: August 2025)

HEDIS Compliance Audit

Specification Updates (Anticipated Release Date: December 2025)

Technical specifications for the Health Outcomes Survey (HOS).

Order this publication (Anticipated Release Date: May 2026)
